Others: Bolivia won against Colombia 1-0 on Thursday night.
Bolivia's Miguel Terceros scored the winning goal.
Bolivia has a perfect record of three wins out of three since moving their home games to El Alto.
Bolivia defeated Venezuela 4-0 in their first game in El Alto.
Bolivia's away record includes their first win in a competitive game outside their home country since 2015 and their first away win in World Cup qualifying since 1993.
